api_list.api_description: Get information about a single senseBox.

required_parameters.name: sense_box_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the senseBox you are referring to.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The format the sensor data is returned in.

query: Can you provide the latest weather measurements from a specific weather station senseBox 57000b8745fd40c8196ad04c, and also give me a weather forecast for Pittsburgh Pennsylvania?
